thread.title: Kathy Mascio
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Kathy Mascio

author: Kathy Mascio
title: Kathy Mascio
text: I went to Auto Lenders in Williamstown and had a wonderful experience. Manny was very patient with me answered all my questions, Told him what I was looking for and within a very short period of time I was test driving a Chrysler 200. Yes I bought it and the entire transaction did not eat up my day. I was in and out in no time. I did not think when I decided to go there that I would be driving a car home. Thanks again Manny
